Item.method_code:
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim genericMethodId As String = Me.getProperty("pre_action","") If genericMethodId = "" Then Return Me
Dim methodItm As Item = Me.newItem("","") methodItm.loadAML("<Item type='Method' action='get' id='" & genericMethodId & "' select='name,generation,keyed_name' />") methodItm = methodItm.apply()
If methodItm.getProperty("name","") = "LC PreTransition Handler" Then Me.setProperty("is_generic_pre_action","1") Else Me.setProperty("is_generic_pre_action","0")
If (Me.getProperty("pre_action_validation","") <> "" Or Me.getProperty("pre_action_post_validation","") <> "") Then Return Me.getInnovator().newError("Values for 'Pre Action Validations' and 'Pre Action Post Validation' can only be used, when value 'Pre Action' is set to 'LC PreTransition Handler' !") End If End If Return Me
Item.name: DetectGenericLCTransPreAction
